name: Mr. Muffin's Camping Adventure
description:
Help Mr. Muffin pack items for his week-long camping trip! His little froggy life depends on it!

CONTROLS:

[WASD] to navigate menus / move items

[SPACE] to select/place/pickup items

[Q] and [E] to rotate items

[TAB] to swap between item addition mode and backpack rearrangement mode

[BACKSPACE] to delete / cancel

[ENTER] to finish packing and send Mr. Muffin on his camping adventure!

[ESC] to exit (windows only)

CREDITS:

BirdCatNate: Scripting / Bugfixing / Game Balancing

Thaira: Scripting / Music / Story

PocketRituals: Art / Animation

Special thanks to Thunder for voicing the Park Ranger and the Pyramid Scheme Frog.
